org.apache.fop.traits

Interface WritingModeTraitsGetter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WritingModeTraitsSetter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockContainer, PageSequence, Table, WritingModeTraits

    public interface WritingModeTraitsGetter
    This interface provides read access to FO traits related to writing mode.
